name: Tweinflugger
body:
Zweinflugger!
=========

Oh no! Aliens!
Lucky we got these prototype aircraft we stole from the germans in WWII!

Two players on one keyboard (ZQSD and arrows for now (ZQSD is the AZERTY Layout WASD, I will make controls configurable soon).
As long as one Zweinflugger is alive, a downed Zweinflugger can ressurect and return to battle. Shoot down as many aliens as you can!

#[PLAY HERE](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/6549099/Zweinflugger!.zip)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
